lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Newmont said the new Magma rules also provide that shareholder action can be taken only at shareholder meetings, prohibiting shareholder action by written consent, and include "fair price" provisions limiting combinations with any holder of more than 10 pct of Magma's voting power.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company said there are two exceptions under the bylaws -- the 15 pct of Magma's stock it is retaining and the 21 pct which will be held by <Consolidated Gold Fields PLC> as a result of its ownership of that portion of Newmont.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Newmont said Magma's restated certificate of incorporation also limits change in control of the company by dividing the board into three classes serving staggered terms.
